response.overview: The Blind 3 is following with two parts of the love journey in BL 1 and 2 which lead with 3 hearts and their unconditional love. Naina being the center of the love triangle who has gone with a heavy heart failed incidence of loosing Rohan in life and then having an unexpected entry of Rohit with same face as like Rohan. But Naina's true love for Rohan could not let Rohit to win her heart. Naina is still waiting for Rohan, will Blind Love 3 give Naina a ray of Hope?
response.title: Blind love 3
